<title level="1" right="Rules">[Animal Companions and Familiars](/Rules.aspx?ID=148)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 214 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some adventurers travel with loyal allies known as animal companions and familiars. The former begin as young animals but acquire impressive physical abilities as you level up, while the latter share a magical bond with you.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
